Ab 3d main sab dikh raheyo,', 'Duniya chali mars pe,', '

Arry black-and-white se colour hua,', '
Ab 3d main sab dikh raheyo,', 'Haaro chaad gye everest ka pahad,', '

Ab to toilet ka jugaad,', '
